body: If you're reading this comment, you're probably okay. If you've posted a curse 5 times, you will have the worst luck over the next 10 years of your life, and you'll die after 10 years and your parents will suffer in their remaining life unless you apologize 10 time for every curse you've posted in that doujinshi, good luck may god never let u have offsprings.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. Lol I don't believe this but I am just indulging the one who posted this comment.
